alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 17 at 4:26PM CDT until March 17 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Southeastern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... Northwestern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 426 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Samson, or 13 miles west of Geneva, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Hartford around 500 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Earlytown, Pera, Chancellor, Spears, Kellys Crossroads, Sellersville, Lytle, High Bluff, Highfalls and Marl. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
